Native 
 public Native()

flushWorkingSet 
 public static native int flushWorkingSet()
Set the working set of this process to 0. This causes the OS to reload pages as they're touched. Only for NT/95.

registerPID 
 public static native int registerPID()
Write the process ID of the current process to a well-known place.

registerPort 
 public static native int registerPort(int port)
Register a port number with the system registry so uCosmHelper can find it later.

the current value of the high-res timer in microseconds.

openURL 
 public static native int openURL(String url)
Given a valid URL, does whatever the system does when you launch a URL.

openURLAsync 
 public static boolean openURLAsync(String url)
Given a valid URL, does whatever the system does when you launch a URL, but in another thread so you don't have to wait for it. NOTE: The status of actual URL launch is not returned, only whether or not the launch thread was created.

Parameters:
url - = the URL to launch
Returns:
true if could create the URLLaunchThread, false otherwise.
deleteAllShortcuts 
 public static native boolean deleteAllShortcuts()
Delete all the shortcuts to Avatars in the Start Menu

createShortcut 
 public static native boolean createShortcut(String avatarName)
Create a shortcut in the Start Menu for a given Avatar

Parameters:
avatarName - - the name of the avatar for which to create a shortcut
deleteShortcut 
 public static native boolean deleteShortcut(String avatarName)
Delete a shortcut in the Start Menu for a given Avatar

Parameters:
avatarName - - the name of the avatar for which to delete a shortcut
renameShortcut 
 public static native boolean renameShortcut(String oldAvatarName,
                                             String newAvatarName)
Rename a shortcut in the Start Menu for a given Avatar

Parameters:
oldAvatarName - - the current name
newAvatarName - - the new name
